inputs.description: -hemi <left or right>: specify the hemisphere being processed  [-prefix <fileprefix>]: Prefix for distance and node color output files. This option is optional. Existing file will not be overwritten.
inputs.name: HEMI

inputs.description: -box <wX wY wZ>: restrict intersection computations for nodes contained in a box of w* dimensions. This might speed things up sometimes if the box dimension needs not be large. This option is pretty much useless.   For more help: https://afni.nimh.nih.gov/pub/dist/doc/htmldoc/SUMA/main_toc.html   If you can't get help here, please get help somewhere.   Compile Date: Sep  7 2018   Shruti Japee LBC/NIMH/NIH shruti@codon.nih.gov Ziad Saad SSSC/NIMH/NIH saadz@mail.nih.gov
inputs.name: BOX
